successes.title: The Thunderbirds Co-operative Board Game by Matt Leacock
successes.description: Join International Rescue, avert disasters, and foil the Hood’s evil scheme in THUNDERBIRDS, the new co-op game from Matt Leacock

Pledges.description: Join International Rescue! With a simple £1 donation you'll get our email updates and you can take part in the comments and decide later on which pledge level to back.
Just want the plastic models from the board game (not expansions)? This is for you! You'll also have your name in the credits in the game. Note the models are available as Add Ons as well.
The Thunderbirds board game PLUS any unlocked BASE GAME UPGRADES. Includes name in credits. Add Ons may incur additional shipping which will be charged after the Kickstarter.
THUNDERBIRDS BOARD GAME (Approx $62 / €54) - GEN CON, ESSEN SPIELE AND DRAGONMEET PICKUP ONLY
The Thunderbirds board game PLUS any unlocked BASE GAME UPGRADES. Includes name in credits.
Le jeu THUNDERBIRDS (~54€) + tous les paliers du jeu de base qui auront été débloqués + votre nom figurant dans les crédits.

Frais de port offerts pour la France.
Date de livraison estimée : août 2015
NOTE : FRENCH VERSION OF GAME ONLY
RETAIL PLEDGE - THUNDERBIRDS BOARD GAME (Approx $62 / €54) - ORDER DEPOSIT
The Thunderbirds board game PLUS any unlocked BASE GAME UPGRADES. Includes store name in credits.
See Retailers Section for more info on how to order. Minimum order requirements. Shipping will be charged separately.
